DOC.HEADLINE: THE PRESS ; TAKING_AIM AT NORTH_KOREA
DOC.TEXT: North_Korea is defying most of the world by refusing to let the International Atomic Energy Agency inspect a facility suspected of producing plutonium.The nation denies it is making nuclear_weapons . But troops in South_Korea and North_Korea were put_on high alert last week as the war of words escalated . Meanwhile , cartoonists have been firing off caricatures of President Kim Il Sung and worrying about the effects of the dispute on international peace and nuclear treaties .
